Question_EN: How do I install Kiara?
Answer_EN: To install Kiara to your Slack workspace: 1) Access the Kiara website, 2) Click 'Try create it free for 14 days' button on the top page, 3) Follow the on-screen instructions

Question_EN: What should I check before installing Kiara?
Answer_EN: Check how many users are in your Slack workspace beforehand. Ensure the number of people registered with Kiara matches the actual number of people in your Slack workspace, otherwise Kiara might not work.

Question_EN: What languages does Kiara support?
Answer_EN: Kiara supports 100 languages including major world languages like English, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, French, as well as regional and Asian languages. If your language is not on the list, contact them via form or hello@kiara.team.

Question_EN: How do I add or delete languages?
Answer_EN: Say '@kiara' in the message box, then press 'Add' or 'Delete' button and select the language you want to add or remove.

Question_EN: How do I turn translation on or off?
Answer_EN: Say '@kiara' in the message box, click 'Setting' and toggle 'Translation' on or off.

Question_EN: What is 'Translation in reply' mode?
Answer_EN: When the timeline feels too noisy, you can activate 'Translation in reply' mode to reduce timeline noise. Say '@kiara', click 'Setting', and set 'Translation in reply'.

Question_EN: What is 'Status' and 'Consumption'?
Answer_EN: Status shows the languages you set and consumption. Consumption shows the number of characters and percentage used. As of Jan 2021, translation is unlimited so you don't need to worry about it.

Question_EN: How do I invite Kiara to a channel?
Answer_EN: Simply say '@kiara' in the message box to invite Kiara to a channel.

Question_EN: Do you have 'translation memory' or 'glossary'?
Answer_EN: No. If you need to download translation results or want such dashboard, we will consider building it. Please tell us if necessary.
Question_JP: 「翻訳メモリ」や「用語集」はありますか？
Answer_JP: いいえ。翻訳結果のダウンロードやダッシュボードが必要な場合は、構築を検討します。必要であればお知らせください。

Question_EN: Are mentions (@someone) and channels (#channel) translated properly?
Answer_EN: Mentions are translated properly. Channels are translated properly in some languages but show differently in other languages.

Question_EN: Can I show only one language translation?
Answer_EN: No. We cannot provide this feature at the moment. Since some customers asked the same issue, we will implement when we are ready.

Question_EN: Can I add my original translation via Kiara?
Answer_EN: No. We cannot provide this feature at the moment. Since some customers asked us, we will try to implement this when we are ready.

Question_EN: Is bold text translated as bold text?
Answer_EN: Yes, it is reflected (though some languages might not preserve bold formatting).

Question_EN: The translation is wrong. What should I do?
Answer_EN: Currently translation accuracy is 90%. We are working to improve special terms and nuances. Please report significant mistranslation issues through our Contact Form or at hello@kiara.team.

Question_EN: What happens if a sentence contains more than one language?
Answer_EN: The most appropriate language will be detected and reflected into the translated result.

Question_EN: Kiara doesn't work. What should I check?
Answer_EN: If Kiara doesn't react after inviting to a channel: 1) Check user count in your Slack workspace (#general channel), 2) Change the user count at Kiara's dashboard to match.

Question_EN: Can I correct the translated result?
Answer_EN: No. You cannot correct the translated result even if the translation was wrong. This is due to the limitation of Slack App. We hope Slack will change this in the future.

Question_EN: Is there a limit on message length?
Answer_EN: Yes. Maximum length is 5000 characters for a message.

Question_EN: I cannot find Kiara after I install. What's wrong?
Answer_EN: You might have registered the wrong number of users. If the actual number in your Slack workspace differs from the number registered with Kiara, it may not work. Check user count in #general channel and change it at Kiara's dashboard.

Question_EN: Can I use Kiara on my mobile?
Answer_EN: Yes. You can use Kiara on your mobile inside of Slack mobile app.

Question_EN: I cannot invite Kiara to a channel. What should I do?
Answer_EN: If you cannot invite Kiara at all, or only to #general but not other channels, or get errors: Say '@kiara' in the message box to invite Kiara to the channel.

Question_EN: Do you offer any discounts?
Answer_EN: Yes. Please contact us directly via form or at hello@kiara.team

Question_EN: Can I pay by invoice?
Answer_EN: Yes. We ask you pay annually if you want to pay by invoice. We offer 20% discount for annual advance payment by invoice. For specific period invoicing, contact us via form or hello@kiara.team.

Question_EN: Can I pay annually?
Answer_EN: Yes. You can pay either by card or invoice. For one-time payment for specific periods, contact us via form or hello@kiara.team.

Question_EN: How do I update my credit card details?
Answer_EN: From dashboard: 1) Sign in at the top, 2) Authorize and access info, 3) Click 'Plan Setting', 4) Click 'Update Plan Setting', 5) Fill payment form and email, 6) Click 'Update Plan and Payment'.

Question_EN: I installed Kiara but someone else needs to pay. How do I change the payer?
Answer_EN: From dashboard: 1) Sign in at Kiara's website, 2) Authorize app and access info, 3) Click 'Plan Setting' button to change payer.

Question_EN: Can you issue a quotation?
Answer_EN: Yes. We can issue a quotation. Please ask us via form or at hello@kiara.team

Question_EN: How do I delete Kiara?
Answer_EN: To cancel subscription, please fill in the contact form and we will let you know after the cancellation has been done.

Question_EN: Are past messages deleted if I cancel my subscription?
Answer_EN: No. If you cancel your subscription, Kiara will stop the translation but past messages will not be deleted.

Question_EN: How can I cancel the subscription?
Answer_EN: To cancel subscription, please fill in contact form and we will let you know after the cancellation has been done.

Question_EN: How can I contact Kiara?
Answer_EN: Chat via chat box on bottom right, visit our contact form, email hello@kiara.team, or call/text via WhatsApp: +818063062223 or +80 9286 3531

Question_EN: How do you keep or use customer data?
Answer_EN: Kiara implements an immediate data deletion policy to protect customer privacy. We do not sell customer data or use it for AI training purposes.
Question_JP: Kiaraはどの様に顧客のデータを扱いますか？
Answer_JP: Kiaraは顧客のプライバシーを保護するため、即時データ削除ポリシーを実施しています。顧客データを販売したり、AIトレーニングに使用したりすることはありません。

Question_EN: Sometimes we see duplicated translation
Answer_EN: Duplicated translations can occur during periods of high traffic. This is related to technical debt in our database structure. We are working on improving the system to reduce these occurrences.
Question_JP: 重複した翻訳が表示されることがあります
Answer_JP: トラフィックが多い期間中に重複した翻訳が発生することがあります。これはデータベース構造の技術的な問題に関連しています。これらの発生を減らすためにシステムの改善に取り組んでいます。

Question_EN: How to re-install Kiara after technical problem
Answer_EN: To re-install Kiara after experiencing technical problems: 1) Remove Kiara from your Slack workspace, 2) Clear browser cache and cookies, 3) Restart your browser, 4) Follow the standard installation process again, 5) Ensure user count matches your Slack workspace, 6) Contact support if issues persist.
Question_JP: 技術的問題後のKiara再インストール方法
Answer_JP: 技術的な問題が発生した後にKiaraを再インストールするには: 1) SlackワークスペースからKiaraを削除, 2) ブラウザのキャッシュとCookieをクリア, 3) ブラウザを再起動, 4) 標準のインストールプロセスを再度実行, 5) ユーザー数がSlackワークスペースと一致することを確認, 6) 問題が続く場合はサポートに連絡してください。

Question_EN: What is Kiara's Customer Support Service Level Objective (SLO)?
Answer_EN: Kiara's Customer Support SLO includes: 1) First Response Time - 95% of inquiries within 1 business day, 2) Critical Issue Acknowledgment - 100% within 4 business hours, 3) Resolution Time - 90% of cases resolved within 2 business days, 4) Ongoing Case Updates - 100% updated every 7 business days, 5) SLA Compliance - ≥90% across all targets, 6) Customer Satisfaction - ≥4.5/5 rating.
Question_JP: KiaraのカスタマーサポートSLOは？
Answer_JP: Kiaraのカスタマーサポート SLOには以下が含まれます: 1) 初回応答時間 - 1営業日以内に95%の問い合わせに対応, 2) 重大問題の確認 - 4営業時間以内に100%, 3) 解決時間 - 2営業日以内に90%のケースを解決, 4) 進行中のケース更新 - 7営業日ごとに100%更新, 5) SLAコンプライアンス - 全目標で≥90%, 6) 顧客満足度 - ≥4.5/5評価。
